# Fundamental Studio Website Replica - Copilot Instructions

This is an Astro project that replicates the Fundamental Studio website (https://www.fundamental.bg/en). 

## Project Guidelines:
- Use Astro components for modular, reusable UI elements
- Follow Tailwind CSS for styling with modern, responsive design
- Implement smooth animations and transitions similar to the original
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Structure components following Astro best practices
- Focus on performance and accessibility
- Use semantic HTML and proper heading hierarchy

## Key Features to Implement:
- Modern navigation with smooth hover effects
- Hero section with "Turning Vision Into Voltage" tagline
- Services showcase with interactive cards
- Portfolio gallery with project previews
- Client testimonials carousel
- Awards and recognition section
- Blog preview section
- Contact CTA section
- Responsive footer with contact info and social links

## Design Principles:
- Dark theme with bright accent colors
- Clean, modern typography
- Smooth animations and micro-interactions
- Mobile-first responsive design
- High contrast for accessibility
- Professional, agency-style aesthetic
